//<![CDATA[ 
document.domain="qq.com";
function ptlogin2_onResize(width, height) {
	//获得浮动Div对象
	login_wnd = document.getElementById("login_div");
	if (login_wnd)  {
		//重新设置大小注意，一定要加px，否则firefox下有问题
		login_wnd.style.width = width + "px";
		login_wnd.style.height = height + "px";
		//最好重新调整登录框的位置， 这儿略....
		//先隐藏，在显示，这样可以避免滚动条的出现
		login_wnd.style.visibility = "hidden"
		login_wnd.style.visibility = "visible"
		login_wnd.style.marginLeft = "-"+parseInt(width/2) + 'px';
		login_wnd.style.marginTop = "-"+parseInt(height/2) + 'px';
	}
}
function ptlogin2_onClose(){
	document.getElementById("login_div").style.left = "-9999px";
	document.getElementById("loginBg").style.display = "none";
}
function userLogin(){
	document.getElementById("login_frame").src = "http://ui.ptlogin2.qq.com/cgi-bin/login?hide_title_bar=0&low_login=0&qlogin_auto_login=1&no_verifyimg=1&link_target=blank&appid=636014201&target=self&s_url=http%3A//www.qq.com/qq2012/loginSuccess.htm";
	document.getElementById("login_div").style.left = "50%";
	document.getElementById("loginBg").style.display = "block";
	document.getElementById("loginBg").style.width= document.body.clientWidth + "px";
	document.getElementById("loginBg").style.height= document.body.clientHeight + "px";
}
/*一键登录数据*/
function loginAll(obj){
	if(obj.result == 0){
		MblogTotalnum = obj.info.Mblog.totalnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Mblog-totalnum', obj.info.Mblog.totalnum); 
		MblogMsgnum = obj.info.Mblog.msgnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Mblog-msgnum', obj.info.Mblog.msgnum);
		MblogAtnum = obj.info.Mblog.atnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Mblog-atnum', obj.info.Mblog.atnum);
		MblogFansnum = obj.info.Mblog.fansnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Mblog-fansnum', obj.info.Mblog.fansnum);
		QZoneTotalnum = obj.info.QZone.totalnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QZone-totalnum', obj.info.QZone.totalnum);
		QZonePassivenum = obj.info.QZone.passivenum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QZone-passivenum', obj.info.QZone.passivenum);
		QZoneInitnum = obj.info.QZone.initnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QZone-initnum', obj.info.QZone.initnum);
		QZoneAboutnum = obj.info.QZone.aboutnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QZone-aboutnum', obj.info.QZone.aboutnum);
		QMailTotalnum = obj.info.QMail.totalnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QMail-totalnum', obj.info.QMail.totalnum);
		QMailInboxnum = obj.info.QMail.inboxnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QMail-inboxnum', obj.info.QMail.inboxnum);
		QMailBottlenum = obj.info.QMail.bottlenum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QMail-bottlenum', obj.info.QMail.bottlenum);
		QMailGmailnum = obj.info.QMail.gmailnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QMail-gmailnum', obj.info.QMail.gmailnum);
		QMailDmailnum = obj.info.QMail.dmailnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('QMail-dmailnum', obj.info.QMail.dmailnum);
		/*
		FriendTotalnum = obj.info.Friend.totalnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Friend-totalnum', obj.info.Friend.totalnum);
		FriendPassivenum = obj.info.Friend.passivenum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Friend-passivenum', obj.info.Friend.passivenum);
		FriendInitnum = obj.info.Friend.initnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Friend-initnum', obj.info.Friend.initnum);
		FriendAboutnum = obj.info.Friend.aboutnum || 0; QQ.localData.set('Friend-aboutnum', obj.info.Friend.aboutnum);
		*/
		userInfoUin = uin; QQ.localData.set('Uin', uin);
		nick = userInfoName = obj.nick.replace(/</,"&lt;").replace(/>/,"&gt;"); QQ.localData.set('nick', userInfoName);
		userInfoVip = obj.Vip; QQ.localData.set('Vip', userInfoVip || 0);
		Face = userInfoFace = obj.Face || 'http://mat1.gtimg.com/news/dc/temp/c1.jpg'; QQ.localData.set('Face', userInfoFace || 'http://mat1.gtimg.com/news/dc/temp/c1.jpg');
		
		UI && UI.getScript("http://mini.t.qq.com/mini/mycheck.php?r=" + (new Date).getTime());//add 20130226

		if(MblogTotalnum){
			if(MblogTotalnum > 99){
				document.getElementById("weiboNum").innerHTML = "99+";
			}else{
				document.getElementById("weiboNum").innerHTML = MblogTotalnum;
			}
			document.getElementById("weiboNum").style.padding = "0 7px";
			if(MblogMsgnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("msgNum").innerHTML = MblogMsgnum;
				document.getElementById("msgLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(MblogAtnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("atNum").innerHTML = MblogAtnum;
				document.getElementById("atLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(MblogFansnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("fansNum").innerHTML = MblogFansnum;
				document.getElementById("fansLi").style.display = "block";
			}
		}else{
			document.getElementById("weiboTitle").innerHTML = "<a href='http://t.qq.com' target='_blank'>点击查看腾讯微博</a>";
		}
		if(QZoneTotalnum){
			if(QZoneTotalnum > 99){
				document.getElementById("qzoneNum").innerHTML = "99+";
			}else{
				document.getElementById("qzoneNum").innerHTML = QZoneTotalnum;
			}
			document.getElementById("qzoneNum").style.padding = "0 7px";
			if(QZonePassivenum != ""){
				document.getElementById("passiveNum").innerHTML = QZonePassivenum;
				document.getElementById("passiveLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QZoneInitnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("InitNum").innerHTML = QZoneInitnum;
				document.getElementById("InitLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QZoneAboutnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("AboutNum").innerHTML = QZoneAboutnum;
				document.getElementById("AboutLi").style.display = "block";
			}
		}else{
			document.getElementById("qzoneTitle").innerHTML = "<a href='http://qzone.qq.com' target='_blank'>点击查看QQ空间</a>";
		}
		if(QMailTotalnum){
			if(QMailTotalnum > 99){
				document.getElementById("mailNum").innerHTML = "99+";
			}else{
				document.getElementById("mailNum").innerHTML = QMailTotalnum;
			}
			document.getElementById("mailNum").style.padding = "0 7px";
			weiDu = QMailTotalnum - QMailInboxnum - QMailBottlenum - QMailGmailnum - QMailDmailnum;
			if(QMailInboxnum != ""){
				if(weiDu != 0){
					document.getElementById("inboxNum").innerHTML = Number(QMailInboxnum) + Number(weiDu);
					document.getElementById("inboxLi").style.display = "block";
				}else{
					document.getElementById("inboxNum").innerHTML = QMailInboxnum;
					document.getElementById("inboxLi").style.display = "block";
				}
			}else if(weiDu != 0){
				document.getElementById("inboxNum").innerHTML = weiDu;
				document.getElementById("inboxLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QMailBottlenum != ""){
				document.getElementById("bottleNum").innerHTML = QMailBottlenum;
				document.getElementById("bottleLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QMailGmailnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("gmailNum").innerHTML = QMailGmailnum;
				document.getElementById("gmailLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QMailDmailnum != ""){
				document.getElementById("dmailNum").innerHTML = QMailDmailnum;
				document.getElementById("dmailLi").style.display = "block";
			}
			if(QMailInboxnum == "" && QMailBottlenum == "" && QMailGmailnum == "" && QMailDmailnum == ""){
				document.getElementById("mailTitle").innerHTML = "<a href='http://mail.qq.com' target='_blank'>点击查看QQ邮箱</a>";
			}
		}else{
			document.getElementById("mailTitle").innerHTML = "<a href='http://mail.qq.com' target='_blank'>点击查看QQ邮箱</a>";
		}
		/*
		if(FriendTotalnum){
			if(FriendTotalnum > 99){
				document.getElementById("pengyouNum").innerHTML = "99+";
			}else{
				document.getElementById("pengyouNum").innerHTML = FriendTotalnum;
			}
			document.getElementById("pengyouNum").style.padding = "0 7px";
			if(FriendPassivenum != ""){
				document.getElementById("pengyouPassiveNum").innerHTML = FriendPassivenum;
				document.getElementById("pengyouPassiveLi").style.display = "block";
			}

				document.getElementById("pengyouInitNum").innerHTML = FriendInitnum;
				document.getElementById("pengyouInitLi").style.display = "block";
			}

				document.getElementById("pengyouAboutNum").innerHTML = FriendAboutnum;
				document.getElementById("pengyouAboutLi").style.display = "block";
			}
		}else{
			document.getElementById("pengyouTitle").innerHTML = "<a href='http://www.pengyou.com' target='_blank'>点击查看朋友网</a>";
		}
		
		document.getElementById("pengyouIcon").onmouseover = function(){
			document.getElementById("pengyouSmart").style.display = "block";
		}
		document.getElementById("pengyouIcon").onmouseout = function(){
			document.getElementById("pengyouSmart").style.display = "none";
		}
		*/
		document.getElementById("mailIcon").onmouseover = function(){
			document.getElementById("mailSmart").style.display = "block";
		}
		document.getElementById("mailIcon").onmouseout = function(){
			document.getElementById("mailSmart").style.display = "none";
		}
		document.getElementById("qzoneIcon").onmouseover = function(){
			document.getElementById("qzoneSmart").style.display = "block";
		}
		document.getElementById("qzoneIcon").onmouseout = function(){
			document.getElementById("qzoneSmart").style.display = "none";
		}
		document.getElementById("weiboIcon").onmouseover = function(){
			document.getElementById("weiboSmart").style.display = "block";
		}
		document.getElementById("weiboIcon").onmouseout = function(){
			document.getElementById("weiboSmart").style.display = "none";
		}
		
		document.getElementById("userName").innerHTML = userInfoName;
		document.getElementById("logined").style.display = "block";
		document.getElementById("loginAll").style.display = "none";
		document.getElementById("loginOut").onclick = function(){
			login.loginOut();
			//MI &&　MI.Login.logout();//打通微博一键登录
			//新版评论add
			if(window['ifr_cmt_status'] && document.getElementById('commentIframe')){
				 document.getElementById('commentIframe').contentWindow.publicLogout();
				 //registerCoralEvent.publicLogout();
			}
			return false;
		}
		if(typeof loginAllCallBack=="function"){
			loginAllCallBack(userInfoName);
		}
	}
	
	//新版评论add
	if(window['ifr_cmt_status'] && document.getElementById('commentIframe')){
		//registerCoralEvent.publicLogined(uin, nick, Face);
		document.getElementById('commentIframe').contentWindow.publicLogined(uin, nick, Face);
	}
}
function reloadLoginInfo(){
var _obj = {"result":"0","Uin":QQ.localData.get('Uin'),"nick":QQ.localData.get('nick'),"Vip":QQ.localData.get('Vip'),"Face":QQ.localData.get('Face'),"info":{"QZone":{"totalnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QZone-totalnum')),"passivenum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QZone-passivenum')),"initnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QZone-initnum')),"aboutnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QZone-aboutnum'))},/*"Friend":{"totalnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Friend-totalnum')),"passivenum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Friend-passivenum')),"initnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Friend-initnum')),"aboutnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Friend-aboutnum'))},*/"QMail":{"totalnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QMail-totalnum')),"inboxnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QMail-inboxnum')),"bottlenum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QMail-bottlenum')),"gmailnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QMail-gmailnum')),"dmailnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('QMail-dmailnum'))},"Mblog":{"totalnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Mblog-totalnum')),"msgnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Mblog-msgnum')),"atnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Mblog-atnum')),"fansnum":parseInt(QQ.localData.get('Mblog-fansnum'))}}}
	loginAll(_obj);
}
window.QQ = {};
QQ.localData = {
	 hname:location.hostname ? location.hostname : 'localStatus',
	 isLocalStorage:window.localStorage ? true : false,
	 dataDom:null,
	 initDom:function(){ //初始化userData
		 if(!this.dataDom){
			 try{
				 this.dataDom = document.createElement('input');//这里使用hidden的input元素
				 this.dataDom.type = 'hidden';
				 this.dataDom.style.display = "none";
				 this.dataDom.addBehavior('#default#userData');//这是userData的语法
				 document.body.appendChild(this.dataDom);
				 var exDate = new Date();
				 exDate = exDate.getDate()+30;
				 this.dataDom.expires = exDate.toUTCString();//设定过期时间
			 }catch(ex){
				 return false;
			 }
		 }
		 return true;
	 },
	 set:function(key,value){
		 if(this.isLocalStorage){
			 window.localStorage.setItem(key,value);
		 }else{
			 if(this.initDom()){
				 this.dataDom.load(this.hname);
				 this.dataDom.setAttribute(key,value);
				 this.dataDom.save(this.hname)
			 }
		 }
	 },
	 get:function(key){
		 if(this.isLocalStorage){
			 return window.localStorage.getItem(key);
		 }else{
			 if(this.initDom()){
				 this.dataDom.load(this.hname);
				 return this.dataDom.getAttribute(key);
			 }
		 }
	 },
	 remove:function(key){
		 if(this.isLocalStorage){
			 localStorage.removeItem(key);
		 }else{
			 if(this.initDom()){
				 this.dataDom.load(this.hname);
				 this.dataDom.removeAttribute(key);
				 this.dataDom.save(this.hname)
			 }
		 }
	 }
}
QQ.Cookie={
	set:function(name,value,expires,path,domain){
		if(typeof expires=="undefined"){
			expires=new Date(new Date().getTime()+3600*1000);
		}
		document.cookie=name+"="+escape(value)+((expires)?"; expires="+expires.toGMTString():"")+((path)?"; path="+path:"; path=/")+((domain)?";domain="+domain:"");
	},
	get:function(name){
		var arr=document.cookie.match(new RegExp("(^| )"+name+"=([^;]*)(;|$)"));
		if(arr!=null){
			return unescape(arr[2]);
		}
		return null;
	},
	clear:function(name,path,domain){
		if(this.get(name)){
			document.cookie=name+"="+((path)?"; path="+path:"; path=/")+((domain)?"; domain="+domain:"")+";expires=Fri, 02-Jan-1970 00:00:00 GMT";
		}
	}
};
function getExpires(a){//a:hour
	var expires=new Date(new Date().getTime()+(a?a:1)*24*3600*1000);
	return expires;
}

window["login"] = {
	loginCheck:function(){
		if(QQ.Cookie.get("skey")){
			uin = Number(QQ.Cookie.get("uin").substring(1));
			skey = QQ.Cookie.get("skey");
			try{
				var loginScript = document.createElement ("script");
				loginScript.charset="utf-8";
				loginScript.src = "http://qfwd.qq.com/?uin=" + uin + "&skey=" + skey + "&func=loginAll&refresh=0&ran="+Math.random();
				document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(loginScript);
				QQ.localData.set("loginTime", (new Date()).getTime());
			}catch(e){}
		}
	},
	loginCountCheck:function(obj){
		if(document.getElementById(obj).innerHTML != ""){
			document.getElementById(obj).innerHTML = "";
			document.getElementById(obj).parentNode.parentNode.style.display = "none";
		}
	},
	loginOut:function(){
		//var _this = this;
		UI.getScript('https://ui.ptlogin2.qq.com/js/ptloginout.js', function(){
			pt_logout.logout(function(n){
				if(!n){
					//fail
				}
				else{
					//success
					login.loginOutCall();
				}
			});
		});
	},
	loginOutCall: function(){
		var d = (new Date).getTime();
		//QQ.Cookie.clear("skey", '/', "qq.com");
		document.getElementById("logined").style.display = "none";
		document.getElementById("loginAll").style.display = "block";
		login.loginCountCheck("weiboNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("msgNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("atNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("fansNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("qzoneNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("passiveNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("InitNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("AboutNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("mailNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("inboxNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("bottleNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("gmailNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("dmailNum");
		/*
		login.loginCountCheck("pengyouNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("pengyouPassiveNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("pengyouInitNum");
		login.loginCountCheck("pengyouAboutNum");
		*/
		document.getElementById("weiboTitle").innerHTML = "腾讯微博:";
		document.getElementById("qzoneTitle").innerHTML = "QQ空间:";
		document.getElementById("mailTitle").innerHTML = "QQ邮箱:";
		//document.getElementById("pengyouTitle").innerHTML = "朋友网:";
		
		document.getElementById("weiboNum").style.padding = "0 14px";
		document.getElementById("qzoneNum").style.padding = "0 16px";
		document.getElementById("mailNum").style.padding = "0 15px";
		//document.getElementById("pengyouNum").style.padding = "0 16px 0 15px";
		if(typeof loginOutCallBack=="function"){
			loginOutCallBack();
		}
		login.cbArr = [];
		login.cleanCbLogin();
	},
	loginSuccess:function(){
		document.getElementById("loginBg").style.display = "none";
		document.getElementById("login_div").style.left = "-9999px";
		document.getElementById("logined").style.display = "block";
		document.getElementById("loginAll").style.display = "none";
		//加载回调
		if(login.cbArr.length > 0){
			for(var i = login.cbArr.length-1; i >= 0; i--){
				login.cbArr[i]();
			}
		}
		//点击回调
		login.loginCheck();
		login.cbLogin();
		login.cleanCbLogin();
		
	},
	cbArr : new Array(),//加载回调
	cbLogin : function(){},//点击回调
	cleanCbLogin : function(){
		this.cbLogin = function(){}
	}
}
function EA( node, type, listener ) { 
    if (node.addEventListener) {
        node.addEventListener( type, listener, false );
        return true;
    } else if(node.attachEvent) {
        node['e'+type+listener] = listener;
        node[type+listener] = function(){node['e'+type+listener]( window.event );}
        node.attachEvent( 'on'+type, node[type+listener] );
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}
//登录本地存储
EA(window, "load", function(){
	if(QQ.Cookie.get("skey")){
		var _t = QQ.localData.get('loginTime') || 0, t = new Date().getTime();
		if(t - _t > 60000 || QQ.Cookie.get("uin") != QQ.localData.get('Uin')) {
			login.loginCheck();
		}else{
			reloadLoginInfo();
		}
	}
});

<script type="text/javascript">
	(function(d, fname, useSuggest,isChannelPage,pid) {
		var frm = d.forms[fname], elems = frm.elements, input = elems['query'];
		var IS_MSIE = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('msie') != -1 && !window.opera;
		var isIE6 = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('msie 6.0') != -1;
	  var sHost = location.host||'www.qq.com',sitePrefix='www';
		 //var sHost = "sports.qq.com/lottery";
    var CPID = new Array();
		//if(sHost == 'localhost') return;
		if(sHost){
			var arr = sHost.replace(/\.qq\.com$/i,'').split('.');
			//sitePrefix = arr.pop();
			sitePrefix = arr[0];
			document.getElementById("sogouSite").value = sitePrefix + ".qq.com";
		}
        getCPID();
		createHiddenInput('pid',CPID[0],false);
		var scField = createHiddenInput('sourceid',CPID[1],false);
        var sub = document.getElementById("sub");
       // sub.onclick = changeSugg();
		if(typeof sosoArticlKey != 'undefined' && sosoArticlKey.length){
			setFieldValue(input,sosoArticlKey);
		}
		
		function disableHidden(inpt) {
			inpt.disabled = 'disabled';
		}
		function getCPID(){
                        var path = window.location.pathname;
                        if(sitePrefix == "tech"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0001";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "sports"){

                             //var path ="/d/f_players/5/4647/";
                             if(path.indexOf("lottery") != -1){
                                 CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0021";
                                 CPID[1] = "sugg";
                                 return;
                             }
                             if(path.indexOf("csocce") != -1){
                                 CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0020";
                                 CPID[1] = "sugg";
                                 return;
                             }
                             if(path.indexOf("nba") != -1){
                                 CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0019";
                                 CPID[1] = "sugg";
                                 return;
                             }
                             if(path.indexOf("f_players") != -1){
                                 CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0002";
                                 CPID[1] = "sugg";
                                 return;
                             }
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0018";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "news"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0004";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "cul"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-00024";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "fashion"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0005";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "house"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0006";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "games"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0007";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }

                        if(sitePrefix == "ent"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0009";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "comic"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0010";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "blog"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0011";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "cd"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0012";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }

                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0014";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "auto"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0013";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "kid"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0015";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                         if(sitePrefix == "finance"){
                            if(path.indexOf("fund") != -1){
                                CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0017";
                                CPID[1] = "sugg";
                                return;
                            }
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0017";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                             return;
                        }

                        if(sitePrefix == "gongyi"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0022";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        if(sitePrefix == "foxue"){
                            CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0023";
                            CPID[1] = "sugg";
                            return;
                        }
                        CPID[0] = "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0050";
                        CPID[1] = "sugg";

                        
                        
                }
		function createHiddenInput(name, value, disabled) {
			if(elems[name]) {
				elems[name].value = value;
				if(disabled) elems[name].disabled = 'disabled';
				else elems[name].removeAttribute('disabled');
				return elems[name];
			}
			try{
				var element = document.createElement('<input name="'+name+'" />');
			}catch(e){}
			
			if(!element || element.nodeName.toUpperCase() != 'INPUT'){
				var element = document.createElement('input');		
			}
			element.type = 'hidden';
			element.name = name;
			element.value = value;
			if(disabled)
				element.disabled = disabled;
			frm.appendChild(element);
			return element;
		}
		
		function setFieldValue(field, val) {
			field.value = val;
		}
		if(useSuggest) {
			var fnToRun = function() {
				var fileLoaded = function() {
				  if (IS_MSIE && ac.readyState != "complete" && ac.readyState != "loaded") return;
				  if(!sososmart) return;
				  var divs = frm.getElementsByTagName('div');
				  var inputWrap;
				  for(var i=0,len=divs.length;i<len;i++){
				  	if(divs[i].className != 'inputWarp') continue;
				  	inputWrap = divs[i];
				  	break;
				  }
				  
				  sososmart.init(frm,input,true,'',true,inputWrap,null,null,CPID[0],scField);
				}
				var ac = d.createElement('script');
				ac.type = 'text/javascript';
				ac.async = true;
				ac.src = 'http://mat1.gtimg.com/www/js/qq2012/suggestion.v1.0.4.2.js';
				var s = d.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
				
				if(IS_MSIE && !window.opera) {
					ac.onreadystatechange = fileLoaded;
				} else {
					ac.onload = fileLoaded;
				}
				s.parentNode.insertBefore(ac, s);
			};
			if(IS_MSIE){
				if(window.attachEvent){
					window.attachEvent('onload',fnToRun,false);
				}else{
					window.addEventListener('load',fnToRun);
				}
			}else{
				fnToRun();
			}
		}

	})(document, 'soso_search_box', true,true, "sogou-wsse-b58ac8403eb9cf17-0007");

                                  <li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160407/030036.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/44/177/2048/133216379.jpg" alt="大安法师：我们的痛苦 佛菩萨知道"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160407/030036.htm">大安法师：我们的痛苦 佛菩萨知道</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">一切有情众生，只要在轮回里面，由自身善恶业所感召，都有一个本质性的特点，就是苦的感受。这个苦果来自于他所造恶业的业力。比如我们这个世间叫娑婆，又叫堪忍。</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">大安法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%BD%AE%E5%9B%9E" title="轮回">轮回</a></li>

<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BF%A1%E4%BB%B0" title="信仰">信仰</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%A6%BB%E8%8B%A6%E5%BE%97%E4%B9%90" title="离苦得乐">离苦得乐</a></li>
</ul>
</div>

                                  <li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/038459.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/198/37/2048/133180833.jpg" alt="无垢光尊者不可思议的前世 死去又复活接受传法"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/dademingshan2015/gudaigaoseng2015/list2015116102614.htm">古代高僧</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/038459.htm">无垢光尊者不可思议的前世 死去又复活接受</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">从前，法王赤松德赞的王女莲明公主，非常美丽、聪明，深得父王疼爱。她刚到17岁时，忽然得了急病，类似于现在的胃出血。国王得知后，连忙派人带着公主，前往莲花</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">索达吉堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%97%A0%E5%9E%A2%E5%85%89%E5%B0%8A%E8%80%85" title="无垢光尊者">无垢光尊者</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%8E%B2%E8%8A%B1%E7%94%9F%E5%A4%A7%E5%A3%AB" title="莲花生大士">莲花生大士</a></li>

<!--[if !IE]>|xGv00|96b679b0ec316d31dbb9cb1ac98df06d<![endif]-->
                                  <li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160407/031707.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/140/181/2048/133217495.jpg" alt="净慧长老：开悟是在生命拼搏过程中的大碰撞"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">

</div>
<div class="desp">开悟实际上就是在生命拼搏过程中的一次大碰撞。经过一次大碰撞后，我们内心深处就受到一次彻底地净化。烦恼解决不了问题，欢喜也解决不了问题，必须实实在在地去面</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">望见窗外夭夭的桃花，顿时感到撩花弄草的春天扑面而来。春天里，万物欣荣，生机蓬勃，也是人体生理机能、新陈代谢最活跃的时期。然而春雨绵绵，天气潮湿，乍暖还寒</div>

<span class="name">小凡</span><ul class="clearfix">

<div class="desp">一次，李利安教授会见香港中华密教学会会长彻鸿法师，让在西安的学生也一同前去。各位学生就自己的疑惑向老师与法师请益，论及《金刚经》时，法师的教界阐释与李老</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">人与人之间平等相待，人对动物却肆意掠夺、伤害，这不是真正的平等心。所有的生命是平等的，动物和人类一样爱惜自己的身体和生命。追求快乐，躲避痛苦，这是生命的</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">希阿荣博堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">

</div>
<div class="desp">请问佛教中戒律多，是爱我们还是害我们啊？爱我们！你出去驾车要不要系安全带啊？要的。你说警察来罚款，这个警察真可恶。警察是督促你系安全带，系安全带对你有好</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">传喜法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%88%92%E5%BE%8B" title="戒律">戒律</a></li>

</div>
<div class="desp">梦想和责任有同一个归宿，就是心灵的安定和快乐，朝着这个目标去做每一件事。心中空虚，所以才会需要外境来填满。外境的影响也有区别，有的是刺激，有的是启发；有</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">学诚法师</span><ul class="clearfix">

<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/049694.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/46/72/2048/133189606.jpg" alt="当下在家学佛之人 最容易犯的五类错误"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">

</div>
<div class="desp">很多在家居士来寺院作了几天义工以后，内心对佛法的体会比在家时要深很多，不少人问及在家修学不能很快进步的原因在哪里？原因有很多，首先要认识清楚在家修学容易</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">学诚法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%B1%85%E5%A3%AB" title="居士">居士</a></li>

</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160406/049694.htm">16</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/047310.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/163/64/2048/133187683.jpg" alt="龙树菩萨提供的睡眠窍诀 教你睡觉也能修行成就"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/xiuchizhidao2015/list2015116102113.htm">修持指导</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/047310.htm">龙树菩萨提供的睡眠窍诀 教你睡觉也能修行</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">贤明君主勤度过，白昼上夜及下夜，睡时亦非徒无果，于中夜具正念眠。作者对乐行国王说：贤善明智的君主啊，你应合理安排自己的时间，时刻在修行佛法中度过。现在很</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">索达吉堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E6%95%99" title="佛教">佛教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A1%8C%E6%8C%81" title="行持">行持</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%BE%99%E6%A0%91%E8%8F%A9%E8%90%A8" title="龙树菩萨">龙树菩萨</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%9D%A1%E7%9C%A0" title="睡眠">睡眠</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BF%AE%E8%A1%8C" title="修行">修行</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/046529.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/14/62/2048/133187024.jpg" alt="为什么供养没有执著的佛陀能获得福德呢？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/046529.htm">为什么供养没有执著的佛陀能获得福德呢？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">小乘行人说：“佛陀若无接受供养的心，供佛怎么会有福德呢？如果有供养、有收取之心，佛陀才可能回报你的供养，然而按汝宗所许，佛陀的一切执著分别消于法界，去供</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">索达吉堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%A6%8F%E5%BE%B7" title="福德">福德</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BE%9B%E5%85%BB" title="供养">供养</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%81%AD%E6%95%AC%E5%BF%83" title="恭敬心">恭敬心</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%97%A0%E8%AE%B0%E5%BF%83" title="无记心">无记心</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%8F%91%E6%84%BF" title="发愿">发愿</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160406/046529.htm">72</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
<ul class="second">
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/028534.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/167/12/2048/133174427.jpg" alt="太桥旦曾堪布：显教和密教就像凤凰的一对翅膀"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/028534.htm">太桥旦曾堪布：显教和密教就像凤凰的一对翅</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">整个佛教，从不同的角度产生了多种不同的分类体系，其中一种称为显教和密教。按照最常见的世俗定义，显教可以泛指大乘和小乘，密教可以单指金刚乘。显密二教的起点</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">太桥旦曾堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%98%BE%E6%95%99" title="显教">显教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%AF%86%E6%95%99" title="密教">密教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%87%91%E5%88%9A%E4%B9%98" title="金刚乘">金刚乘</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%A4%A7%E5%B0%8F%E4%B9%98" title="大小乘">大小乘</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160406/028534.htm">3</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/045476.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/235/156/2047/133146190.jpg" alt="出家人不会讲法 你就可以瞧不起吗？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/045476.htm">出家人不会讲法 你就可以瞧不起吗？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">从前有座山，山里有个庙，庙里有个老和尚，在给小和尚讲故事，讲什么呢？故事里说啊，从前有座山，山里有个庙，庙里有……我仿佛看见无数的板砖铺天盖地的飞过来啦</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">心愚</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BB%8E%E5%89%8D%E6%9C%89%E5%BA%A7%E5%B1%B1" title="从前有座山">从前有座山</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%87%BA%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA" title="出家人">出家人</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%8F%E6%8C%81%E4%BD%9B%E6%B3%95" title="住持佛法">住持佛法</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%8B%82%E5%A6%84" title="狂妄">狂妄</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%84%9A%E7%97%B4" title="愚痴">愚痴</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/045476.htm">5</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/042663.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/0/150/2047/133144425.jpg" alt="3.4亿抑郁症患者 你可以选择用佛法治病"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/xiuchizhidao2015/list2015116102113.htm">修持指导</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/042663.htm">3.4亿抑郁症患者 你可以选择用佛法治病</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">当今世界，抑郁症如灾难一般流行。全球得抑郁症的人达3.4亿，相当于整个人类的1/16。中国也有2600多万抑郁症患者，未纳入统计的人数会更多。10%至1</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">索达吉堪布</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%B4%A2%E8%BE%BE%E5%90%89%E5%A0%AA%E5%B8%83" title="索达吉堪布">索达吉堪布</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%8A%91%E9%83%81" title="抑郁">抑郁</a></li>

</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/042663.htm">46</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/042272.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/20/149/2047/133144190.jpg" alt="佛教的极乐世界与基督教的天堂有何区别？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/042272.htm">佛教的极乐世界与基督教的天堂有何区别？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">天堂，是由众生的共业力所现的，一个供善业成熟的众生享乐的地方。每一层天大多都有它的天帝管辖，却不一定有佛法。它的快乐是相对的乐，是感觉作用的乐，是终必会</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">崇瑞</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%98%BF%E5%BC%A5%E9%99%80%E4%BD%9B" title="阿弥陀佛">阿弥陀佛</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%9F%BA%E7%9D%A3%E6%95%99" title="基督教">基督教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%9E%81%E4%B9%90%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C" title="极乐世界">极乐世界</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%A4%A9%E5%A0%82" title="天堂">天堂</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/042272.htm">477</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/041936.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/13/148/2047/133143928.jpg" alt="在家居士布置佛堂 这几项一定要注意！"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/fojiaochangshi2015/list2015116102145.htm">佛教常识</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/041936.htm">在家居士布置佛堂 这几项一定要注意！</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">由于佛法的普遍性，佛教已深为大众所接受；学佛者，于家中设置一方佛堂，不但可以早晚礼拜作修持功课，同时能够带来家庭的安乐和谐气氛，具有安定力和安全感的作用</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">星云大师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%98%9F%E4%BA%91%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88" title="星云大师">星云大师</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%B1%85%E5%A3%AB" title="居士">居士</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E5%A0%82" title="佛堂">佛堂</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/041936.htm">180</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/040406.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/132/142/2047/133142517.jpg" alt="界诠法师：宁肯老僧堕地狱 不把佛法作人情"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/foxueyuan2015/xiuchizhidao2015/list2015116102113.htm">修持指导</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/040406.htm">界诠法师：宁肯老僧堕地狱 不把佛法作人情</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">而菩萨为利养故。应答不答。倒说经律。文字无前无后。谤三宝说者。犯轻垢罪。为利养、倒说——今天倒说相似佛法的，遍地都是——念阿弥陀佛，就是助念的时候，非得</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">界诠法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%98%BF%E5%BC%A5%E9%99%80%E4%BD%9B" title="阿弥陀佛">阿弥陀佛</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%95%8C%E8%AF%A0%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%88" title="界诠法师">界诠法师</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%80%92%E8%AF%B4" title="倒说">倒说</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%B8%BA%E5%88%A9%E5%85%BB%E6%95%85" title="为利养故">为利养故</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%BA%94%E7%AD%94%E4%B8%8D%E7%AD%94" title="应答不答">应答不答</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/040406.htm">10</a>

<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/043772.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/229/152/2047/133145164.jpg" alt="丝路佛教第一僧 竟然也叫“八戒”"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/dademingshan2015/gudaigaoseng2015/list2015116102614.htm">古代高僧</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/043772.htm">丝路佛教第一僧 竟然也叫“八戒”</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">远在公元前138年，张骞任使者出使西域之后，便揭开了东西方文化交流互鉴的序幕，打开了中西方国家对话合作的大门。直至公元67年，汉明帝因夜梦金人而派使者到</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">善缘</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%9C%B1%E5%A3%AB%E8%A1%8C" title="朱士行">朱士行</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E6%95%99" title="佛教">佛教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%B8%9D%E8%B7%AF" title="丝路">丝路</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%8F%96%E7%BB%8F" title="取经">取经</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/043772.htm">5</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/017737.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/235/74/2047/133125280.jpg" alt="弘一大师日记详细记录“断食”前后"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/dademingshan2015/dangdaigaoseng2015/list2015116102659.htm">当代高僧</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/017737.htm">弘一大师日记详细记录“断食”前后</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">佛家有断食之说，道教有辟谷之术。萨婆多毗尼毗婆沙卷一载：目连问耆婆曰：“弟子有病，当云何治？”耆婆答曰：“唯以断食为本”。断食时无须太多能量消化食物，大</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">杨晓政</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%BC%98%E4%B8%80%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%88" title="弘一法师">弘一法师</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%96%AD%E9%A3%9F" title="断食">断食</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%AB%98%E5%83%A7" title="高僧">高僧</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160405/017737.htm">1</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160328/049740.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/71/166/2043/132888476.jpg" alt="宗萨仁波切妙语 句句直戳心窝！"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/dademingshan2015/dangdaigaoseng2015/list2015116102659.htm">当代高僧</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160328/049740.htm">宗萨仁波切妙语 句句直戳心窝！</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">我看到的花，你永远看不到，所以我们无法分享真正的花，我们只能假装我们在分享，而这是非常孤独的。我永远不能和你分享我正经历的。我所经历的，只有我能经历。2</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">宗萨仁波切</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%88%86%E4%BA%AB" title="分享">分享</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E6%95%99" title="佛教">佛教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%89%A7%E7%9D%80" title="执着">执着</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%94%9F%E6%B4%BB" title="生活">生活</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160328/049740.htm">7</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160328/040774.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/240/136/2043/132880995.jpg" alt="本焕长老血书《普贤菩萨行愿品》曝光"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">

</div>
<div class="desp">本焕长老二十二岁出家，前半生志在苦行，参研经、律、论之教理教义，坐禅闭关、跪拜五台、刺血写经、燃臂孝母、领众薰修，遵循百丈清规，继承禅门宗风，宣导人间佛</div>

<div class="desp">钟，是佛教丛林寺院里的号令，清晨的钟声是先急后缓，警醒大众，长夜已过，勿再放逸沉睡。而夜晚的钟声是先缓后急，提醒大众觉昏衢，疏昏昧!故丛林的一天作息，是</div>

                         <!-- 讲经说法 -->
                	<ul>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/030948.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/25/44/2048/133182445.jpg" alt="星云大师：你从哪里来？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/chan2015/list2015116101617.htm">禅</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/030948.htm">星云大师：你从哪里来？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">惠能当初见五祖的时候，五祖弘忍大师第一句就问他：“你从哪里来？”“我从岭南来。”惠能回答。“岭南是獦獠的地方，獦獠没有佛性啊！”惠能就回答说：“人有南北</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">星云大师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%BC%98%E5%BF%8D%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88" title="弘忍大师">弘忍大师</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%83%A0%E8%83%BD" title="惠能">惠能</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%90%AF%E5%8F%91" title="启发">启发</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%A6%85%E5%AE%97" title="禅宗">禅宗</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160406/030948.htm">1</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160406/029482.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/206/43/2048/133182371.jpg" alt="为何忆念观音名号就能获得身心清净？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/jinglundaodu2015/list2015116101709.htm">经论导读</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160406/029482.htm">为何忆念观音名号就能获得身心清净？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">而作为凡夫，通过忆念观音名号可否获得身心清净呢？答案是肯定的，且不论经中介绍的脱苦离难、所求皆得，单是我人专注一心于观音名号当中，便有无上之福德。佛法戒</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">佛慧</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A7%82%E4%B8%96%E9%9F%B3%E8%8F%A9%E8%90%A8" title="观世音菩萨">观世音菩萨</a></li>

<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160405/031409.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/107/125/2047/133138157.jpg" alt="西藏高僧活佛谈“藏传佛教热”：聆听正法 消弭误解"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/mi2015/list2015116101654.htm">密</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160405/031409.htm">西藏高僧活佛谈“藏传佛教热”：聆听正法 </a>
</div>
<div class="desp">近年来，追捧活佛和藏传佛教似乎成了一件时髦事儿。在西方，宗教、文化领域的“西藏热”同样不断升温。多位西藏高僧活佛认为，藏传佛教在世界范围内传播，满足了人</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">初学净土者，宜以培植坚固信愿为要务。信有事信与理信二种。事相上的信是相信二有，即《阿弥陀经》所云：“从是西方，过十万亿佛土，有世界名曰极乐。其土有佛，号</div>

<span class="name">大安法师</span><ul class="clearfix">

</div>
<div class="desp">所谓七支坐法，就是指肢体的七种要点：（一）双足伽趺（双盘足）。如果不能双盘，便用单盘。或把左足放在右足上面，叫作如意坐。或把右足放在左足上面，叫作金刚坐</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">南怀瑾</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%85%AD%E5%A6%99%E6%B3%95%E9%97%A8" title="六妙法门">六妙法门</a></li>

</div>
<div class="desp">发愿：四无量心愿诸众生永具安乐及安乐因愿诸众生永离众苦及众苦因愿诸众生永具无苦之乐，我心愉悦愿诸众生远离贪瞋痴心，住平等舍现在得病人，病来方知身是苦。确</div>

<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/jinglundaodu2015/list2015116101709.htm">经论导读</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160331/048866.htm">《普贤行愿品》让我们依教修学？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">普贤菩萨十大愿王（资料图）文：心觉法师《华严经》被称作经中之王，是释迦牟尼佛成道后第二个七日，在菩提树下，为文殊、普贤等上位菩萨所宣说的自内证法门。《华</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">心觉法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%8D%8E%E4%B8%A5%E7%BB%8F" title="华严经">华严经</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%99%AE%E8%B4%A4%E8%A1%8C%E6%84%BF%E5%93%81" title="普贤行愿品">普贤行愿品</a></li>

</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160331/028080.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/31/108/2045/133003696.jpg" alt="妙华法师：只因众生有生死 佛才讲涅槃"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/jinglundaodu2015/list2015116101709.htm">经论导读</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160331/028080.htm">妙华法师：只因众生有生死 佛才讲涅槃</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">华严五祖宗密大师在《圆觉经大疏》中说：“以一切种智释圆明。”我们讲的《华严金狮子章》，就是圆明、圆满、满教。贤首国师说：“由圆明而证菩提。”只有圆明才能</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">妙华法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%8F%A9%E6%8F%90%E5%BF%83" title="菩提心">菩提心</a></li>

<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BA%94%E7%9C%BC%E5%85%AD%E9%80%9A" title="五眼六通">五眼六通</a></li>

<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160331/028080.htm">32</a>
</div>

</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160330/029170.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/254/204/2044/132963374.jpg" alt="悟博法师：《华严金狮子章》概述"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/jiangjingshuofa2015/jinglundaodu2015/list2015116101709.htm">经论导读</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160330/029170.htm">悟博法师：《华严金狮子章》概述</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">《华严金狮子章》共分为十章，第一章：明缘起，第二章：辨色空，第三章：约三性，第四章：显无相，第五章：说无生，第六章：论五教，第七章：勒十玄，第八章：括六</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">现代人吃腻了大鱼大肉、生猛海鲜之后，终于让素食登上了流行餐台。各大城市的素斋馆异军突起，犹如雨后的春笋。根据海内外医学研究结果显示：素食可以降低人体胆固</div>

</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">素食的目的，是为了帮助我们戒除杀心和嗔心。佛教有一部《十善业道经》，其中讲到戒杀的十大利益：“若离杀生，即得成就十离恼法。何等为十?一、于诸众生普施无畏</div>

</div>
<div class="desp">原料：红薯、姜片、红糖、红枣做法：1、把地瓜去皮。2、地瓜切成滚刀片。3、姜片去皮切片。4、在锅里适量水，烧开放入姜片地瓜。5、放入红枣和红糖。6、改中</div>

<div class="desp">有时候“前途”的有无，牵涉到个人“才华”的高低。因此才华一不小心，就会害死一个修行人！《庄子》中有一段话，大意是：地上的小草，因为它“无用”，所以得以自</div>

<div class="desp">今天，天气骤变，狂风大作、尘土飞扬，刮得遮天蔽日，仿佛要摧毁现存的一切，死神好象走进每个人的心灵……死，神秘而玄奥。一条蛇的死，使悟明师幡然醒悟。让我们</div>

<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160325/037861.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/55/73/2042/132799720.jpg" alt="当院士遇到活佛 究竟发生了什么？"></a><div class="text">

</div>
<div class="desp">藏传佛教总给人神秘感，似乎与科学不可兼容。但聆听朱清时院士在西藏的经历，却给人无限启发。作为先后担任中国科技大学、南方科技大学校长的资深科学家，朱清时在</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">唐朝轶</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%AF%86%E5%AE%97" title="密宗">密宗</a></li>

<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160325/031511.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/149/60/2042/132796499.jpg" alt="堂上双亲你不敬 远庙拜佛有何功？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/putilu2015/xiuxingganwu2015/list2015116101415.htm">修行感悟</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160325/031511.htm">堂上双亲你不敬 远庙拜佛有何功？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">相传某地有一个杀猪的屠夫，嗜酒好斗，同时对自己母亲很不孝顺，举动非常粗暴，常常在外边吃醉了酒回家辱骂老母，有时还动手毒打母亲，这位寡妇母亲，生此忤逆儿子</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">慧隆禅寺</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%99%AE%E9%99%80%E5%B1%B1" title="普陀山">普陀山</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A7%82%E4%B8%96%E9%9F%B3%E8%8F%A9%E8%90%A8" title="观世音菩萨">观世音菩萨</a></li>

<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160325/031511.htm">39</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160324/033916.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/191/148/2041/132753956.jpg" alt="如果你有了天眼 会为吃的每一口肉悲伤哭泣"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/putilu2015/xiuxingganwu2015/list2015116101415.htm">修行感悟</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160324/033916.htm">如果你有了天眼 会为吃的每一口肉悲伤哭泣</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">有一次，文殊菩萨示现人身，路过一个屠夫家门，看见有好几个人正在试图擒住一头猪，准备将它宰杀了。那头猪四处狂奔，无法将其被捆绑住。文殊菩萨于是对屠夫们说：</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">善果</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%A4%A9%E7%9C%BC" title="天眼">天眼</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%96%87%E6%AE%8A%E8%8F%A9%E8%90%A8" title="文殊菩萨">文殊菩萨</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%BC%98%E5%88%86" title="缘分">缘分</a></li>

</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160324/033916.htm">369</a>
</div>

</div></li>

<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160311/029604.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/85/42/2034/132271645.jpg" alt="佛教从婆罗门教中继承发展了什么"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160311/029604.htm">佛教从婆罗门教中继承发展了什么</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">佛教公元前六世纪创于古印度，在佛教之前，印度思想界长期居于主导地位的是婆罗门教的思想体系。在公元前一千五百年至一千年左右，是吠陀神话的时期，属于多神崇拜</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">李小托</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E6%95%99" title="佛教">佛教</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%A9%86%E7%BD%97%E9%97%A8" title="婆罗门">婆罗门</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%93%B2%E5%AD%A6" title="哲学">哲学</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160311/029604.htm">10</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160224/025106.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/52/210/2024/131664202.jpg" alt="法师带你解读《西游记》中的禅文化"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160224/025106.htm">法师带你解读《西游记》中的禅文化</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">2016年春季图书发布会，僧人青年作家悟澹法师携新书《解毒&lt;西游记&gt;的禅文化》,与现场读者分享交流了《西游记》中的佛学思想与做人智慧。</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">悟澹法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A5%BF%E6%B8%B8%E8%AE%B0" title="西游记">西游记</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%AD%99%E6%82%9F%E7%A9%BA" title="孙悟空">孙悟空</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%94%90%E5%83%A7" title="唐僧">唐僧</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160224/025106.htm">4</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160222/038403.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/127/17/2024/131615062.jpg" alt="钱穆：不世豪杰在禅门"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160222/038403.htm">钱穆：不世豪杰在禅门</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">钱穆（1895—1990）：史学大师、国学大师。著有《国史大纲》《中国历代政治得失》《中国历史研究法》等1700余万字的史学和文化学著作。</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">钱穆</span><ul class="clearfix">

<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%9B%BD%E5%8F%B2%E5%A4%A7%E7%BA%B2" title="国史大纲">国史大纲</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%B3%95" title="中国历史研究法">中国历史研究法</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E9%AB%98%E5%83%A7" title="高僧">高僧</a></li>

</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160125/019047.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/129/129/2011/130798299.jpg" alt="《西游记》疑情 孙悟空乃杜撰六祖大师？"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160125/019047.htm">《西游记》疑情 孙悟空乃杜撰六祖大师？</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">《解毒西游记的禅文化》（资料图）读者：法师好，大家好。中国的四大名著里面《西游记》跟佛法的关系就更密切，更有渊源，所以我想法师有没有考虑写一本禅读《西游</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">悟澹法师</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A5%BF%E6%B8%B8%E8%AE%B0" title="西游记">西游记</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%AD%99%E6%82%9F%E7%A9%BA" title="孙悟空">孙悟空</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E8%A5%BF%E6%B8%B8%E8%AE%B0%E3%80%8B" title="《西游记》">《西游记》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%85%AD%E7%A5%96%E5%A4%A7%E5%B8%88" title="六祖大师">六祖大师</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160125/019047.htm">50</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
</ul>
<ul class="second">
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160114/020271.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/100/247/2004/130373185.jpg" alt="《历史感应统纪》连载：一念行恶 众善俱失"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160114/020271.htm">《历史感应统纪》连载：一念行恶 众善俱失</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">“飞将军”李广（资料图）主编：许止净译：檀作文李广【原文】李广善射，有才气，匈奴号曰“飞将军”，避之，不入境。广之军吏、士卒，或封侯，而广不得爵。尝语望</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">许止净 檀作文</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94%E7%BB%9F%E7%BA%AA%E3%80%8B" title="《历史感应统纪》">《历史感应统纪》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%9D%8E%E5%B9%BF" title="李广">李广</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E5%BF%8F%E6%82%94" title="忏悔">忏悔</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160114/020271.htm">5</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160113/050277.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/87/152/2004/130348947.jpg" alt="历数《红楼梦》中的声声佛号"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160113/050277.htm">历数《红楼梦》中的声声佛号</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">佛教各种法门之中，念佛法门最为简易方便而普及大众。从本位上看，曹雪芹以世出世法并彰的法理引领着读者步入持名念佛一门，认知“《红楼梦》主题佛教说”的人们早</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">汪海波</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%BA%A2%E6%A5%BC%E6%A2%A6" title="红楼梦">红楼梦</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%99%B4%E9%9B%AF" title="晴雯">晴雯</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E4%BD%9B%E5%8F%B7" title="佛号">佛号</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%B3%95%E7%90%86" title="法理">法理</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160113/050277.htm">230</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160113/018449.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/106/40/2004/130320406.jpg" alt="《历史感应统纪》连载：劝人喝酒 百世无手"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160113/018449.htm">《历史感应统纪》连载：劝人喝酒 百世无手</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">酒之当禁（资料图）主编：许止净译：檀作文田蚡【原文】魏其侯窦婴，孝文后兄子也。武安侯田蚡，孝景后弟也。蚡未贵时，侍酒魏其，跪起如子姪。及贵幸，趋势利者，</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">许止净 檀作文</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94%E7%BB%9F%E7%BA%AA%E3%80%8B" title="《历史感应统纪》">《历史感应统纪》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%94%B0%E8%9A%A1" title="田蚡">田蚡</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%A6%81%E9%85%92" title="禁酒">禁酒</a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160111/020988.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/3/148/2002/130217793.jpg" alt="宋朝将领一怒屠城 报应惨烈累世为猪"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160111/020988.htm">宋朝将领一怒屠城 报应惨烈累世为猪</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">导读：今天这则故事，摘自《历史感应统纪》，第一段文字来自于正规史书，第二段文字则出自《现果随录》，憨山大师《梦游集》中也有类似记载。对此猪喊一声“曹翰”</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">许止净</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94%E7%BB%9F%E7%BA%AA%E3%80%8B" title="《历史感应统纪》">《历史感应统纪》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%9B%B9%E7%BF%B0" title="曹翰">曹翰</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E6%8A%A5%E5%BA%94" title="报应">报应</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160111/020988.htm">15</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20160105/025568.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/120/0/1999/129985095.jpg" alt="《历史感应统纪》连载：恭敬之人必有德行"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20160105/025568.htm">《历史感应统纪》连载：恭敬之人必有德行</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">石奋事父（资料图）主编：许止净译：檀作文石奋【原文】石奋以积劳为大中大夫，无文字，恭谨无比。长子建、次子甲、子乙、子庆，皆以孝谨官至二千石。因号奋为万石</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">许止净 檀作文</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94%E7%BB%9F%E7%BA%AA%E3%80%8B" title="《历史感应统纪》">《历史感应统纪》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%9F%B3%E5%A5%8B" title="石奋">石奋</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20160105/025568.htm">2</a>
</div>
</div>
</div></li>
<li><div class="q_tpwrap clearfix">
<a target="_blank" class="pic" href="/a/20151222/047515.htm"><img src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/234/253/1990/129464499.jpg" alt="《历史感应统纪》连载：冤家宜解不宜结"></a><div class="text">
<div class="name">
<a target="_blank" class="navigation" href="http://rufodao.qq.com/l/foxue/boreshuwu2015/list2015116102714.htm">般若书屋</a><a target="_blank" class="t" href="/a/20151222/047515.htm">《历史感应统纪》连载：冤家宜解不宜结</a>
</div>
<div class="desp">袁盎（资料图）主编：许止净译：檀作文袁盎【原文】袁盎素不好晁错，两人未尝同堂语。吴楚反，错谓盎受吴金钱，专为蔽匿，请治盎。盎至上前对状，言吴反，以错故（</div>
<div class="tips">
<span class="name">许止净 檀作文</span><ul class="clearfix">
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E3%80%8A%E5%8E%86%E5%8F%B2%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94%E7%BB%9F%E7%BA%AA%E3%80%8B" title="《历史感应统纪》">《历史感应统纪》</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E8%A2%81%E7%9B%8E" title="袁盎">袁盎</a></li>
<li><a target="_blank" href="http://rushidao.qq.com/dc_column_article/TagsList.htm?tags=%E7%BB%93%E6%80%A8" title="结怨">结怨</a></li>
</ul>
<a target="_blank" class="comments" href="/a/20151222/047515.htm">1</a>
</div>

</div></li>

	<!-- 禅语 -->
	<div class="zen" id="zen">
             <img class="bg" src="http://img1.gtimg.com/rushidao/pics/hv1/34/35/1968/127978159.jpg" alt="bg">
	<div class="btn">
		<a href="javascript:;">南无阿弥陀佛</a>
		<img src="http://mat1.gtimg.com/rushidao/fo2015/img/shi.png" alt="释">
	</div>
	<p>若人欲了知，三世一切佛。应观法界性，一切唯心造。</p>
	<p>菩提本无树，明镜亦非台。本来无一物，何处惹尘埃？</p>
	<p>一切有为法，如梦幻泡影，如露亦如电，应作如是观。</p>
	<p>诸法因缘生，诸法因缘灭。因缘生灭法，佛说皆是空。</p>
	<p style="display: table-cell;">佛说一切法，对治一切心。若无一切心，即无一切法。</p>
	<p>身是菩提树，心如明镜台。时时勤拂拭，勿使惹尘埃。</p>
	<p>春有百花秋有月，夏有凉风冬有雪。心中若无烦恼事，便是人生好时节！</p>
	<p>欲知前世因，今生受者是。欲知来世果，今生作者是。</p>

</div><!--[if !IE]>|xGv00|eb97a086cc9a71cf280f6354690799c3<![endif]-->
	<!-- 禅语结束 -->

/*footWp*/

                <a href="http://xianggang.17house.com" target="_blank">香港</a>
                <a href="http://aomen.17house.com" target="_blank">澳门</a>
                <a href="http://taiwan.17house.com" target="_blank">台湾</a>
                <a href="http://diaoyudao.17house.com" target="_blank">钓鱼岛</a>
                <a href="http://qita.17house.com" target="_blank">其他</a><!-- mei -->
            </dd>
        </dl>
    </div>
    <!--fenqu end-->
    <div class="main">
        <div class="tuangou">
            <p>一起装修网精选团购活动<span>家具品牌折扣全场低至一折</span></p>
            <div>
                <ul>

                                                    <li><span>  综合</span><a href="http://tuan.17house.com/2487html">端午节超大型装修建材家具博览会</a></li>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript"> 
$(function(){
 var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
 $.getScript(myurl);
});

function initUserInfo(data){

  if(data['uid']){
    $('#setting').show();
    $('#nologin').hide();
	$('#mamaLogout').attr('href','http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=logout&uid='+data['uid']+'&randnum='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024));

	$('#username').text(data['username']);
	
		
  }
}

</script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
            $('#bkSort dt').click(
                function(){
                    if($(this).attr('class')=='on'){
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                    }else{
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                        $(this).addClass('on').next().show();
                    }
                }
            );
         </script>

function initUserInfo2(data){
	var uid = 0;
	if(data['uid']){
		uid = data['uid'];
	}
	$.getJSON("/cms_shtml/php/ajax.php?type=tips&uid="+uid,function(data){
		tips_url = data['js_url'];
		$.ajax({
			type: 'GET',
			dataType: 'script',
			url: tips_url,
			cache: true,
		})
	});
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript"> 
$(function(){
 var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
 $.getScript(myurl);
});

function initUserInfo(data){

  if(data['uid']){
    $('#setting').show();
    $('#nologin').hide();
	$('#mamaLogout').attr('href','http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=logout&uid='+data['uid']+'&randnum='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024));

	$('#username').text(data['username']);
	
		
  }
}

</script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
            $('#bkSort dt').click(
                function(){
                    if($(this).attr('class')=='on'){
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                    }else{
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                        $(this).addClass('on').next().show();
                    }
                }
            );
         </script>

var tips_url = '';
$(function(){
 var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo2&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
 $.getScript(myurl);
});
function initUserInfo2(data){
	var uid = 0;
	if(data['uid']){
		uid = data['uid'];
	}
	$.getJSON("/cms_shtml/php/ajax.php?type=tips&uid="+uid,function(data){
		tips_url = data['js_url'];
		$.ajax({
			type: 'GET',
			dataType: 'script',
			url: tips_url,
			cache: true,
		})
	});
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript"> 
$(function(){
 var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
 $.getScript(myurl);
});

function initUserInfo(data){

  if(data['uid']){
    $('#setting').show();
    $('#nologin').hide();
	$('#mamaLogout').attr('href','http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=logout&uid='+data['uid']+'&randnum='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024));

	$('#username').text(data['username']);
	
		
  }
}

</script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
            $('#bkSort dt').click(
                function(){
                    if($(this).attr('class')=='on'){
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                    }else{
                        $('#bkSort dd').hide();
                        $('#bkSort dt').removeClass('on');
                        $(this).addClass('on').next().show();
                    }
                }
            );
         </script>

<script type="text/javascript"> 
var tips_url = '';
$(function(){
 var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo2&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
 $.getScript(myurl);
});
function initUserInfo2(data){
	var uid = 0;
	if(data['uid']){
		uid = data['uid'];
	}
	$.getJSON("/cms_shtml/php/ajax.php?type=tips&uid="+uid,function(data){
		tips_url = data['js_url'];
		$.ajax({
			type: 'GET',
			dataType: 'script',
			url: tips_url,
			cache: true,
		})
	});
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">  
    var system ={  
        win : false,  
        mac : false,  
        xll : false  
    };  
    
    var mobileScan = parseInt(myGetCookie('mobile_scan'),10);
	if( !(mobileScan > 0)  ){
		//检测平台  
	    var p = navigator.platform;  
	    system.win = p.indexOf("Win") == 0;  
	    system.mac = p.indexOf("Mac") == 0;  
	    //system.x11 = (p == "X11") || (p.indexOf("Linux") == 0);  
	    
	    var isPad = isPad();
	    //跳转语句  
	    //if( isPad ||  !(system.win||system.mac||system.x11)){
	    if( isPad ||  !(system.win||system.mac) ){
	        window.location.href="http://m.mama.cn/1420/";  
	    }
	}
    
    function isPad(){
    	equipmentInfo = navigator.userAgent;
		equipmentInfo = equipmentInfo.substring(0,40);
		equipmentInfo = equipmentInfo.toLowerCase();
		
		if(equipmentInfo.indexOf("pad") > 0){
			return true;
		}else{
			return false;
		}
    }
    function myGetCookie(a) {
		if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
			c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(a + "=");
			if (c_start != -1) {
				c_start = c_start + a.length + 1;
				c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
				if (c_end == -1) {
					c_end = document.cookie.length
				}
				return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end))
			}
		}
		return ""
	}
   
</script>

<script>
    $(function () {
        var _nav = $("#allNav");
        var _box = $(".ny-fixl");
        var _footer = $(".footerWrap");
        var h = _box.height();
        var ft = _footer.offset().top;
        var end = $(document).height() - _footer.height() - _box.height()-50;
        $(window).scroll(function () {
            var t = _nav.offset().top + _nav.height() - 6;
            if(t+h>ft){
                t = end;
            }
            _box.css("top",t);
        }).trigger("scroll");
    });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $("#special_Login .sLog").hover(
        function(){
            $(this).find("dl").show();
        },
        function(){
            $(this).find("dl").hide();
        }
    );

    $("#special_user_info").hover(
        function(){
            $("#sui_drop").show();
        },
        function(){
            $("#sui_drop").hide();
        }
    );
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    session_userid = 0;
    var qrqm_date = '';

    var myDate = new Date();
    var Year = myDate.getFullYear();    //获取完整的年份(4位,1970-????)
    var Month1 = myDate.getMonth()+1;       //获取当前月份(0-11,0代表1月)
    var Month = Month1;
    if(Month1<10) var Month ='0'+Month1;
    var day = myDate.getDate();        //获取当前日(1-31)
    var now_date = Year+'-'+Month+'-'+day;

    $(document).ready(function () {
        //获取passport 登录和注册
        var myurl='http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Passport&d=getUrl&callback=initUrl&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
        $.getScript(myurl);
        //获取登录状态
        //var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
        //$.getScript(myurl);
    });

    function initUrl(result) {
        $('#passport-login').attr('href',result['loginUrl']);
        $('#passport-register').attr('href',result['registerUrl']);
        jQuery.ajax({
             url:result['getCodeUrl'],
             dataType:"jsonp",
             jsonp:"callback",
             cache:false, /*避免jquery缓存*/
             success:function(data){

                /*这里自己编写代码，把接口获取的code值发给passport，以便交换得到一个ticket,然后将ticekt缓存在本地的session中*/
                var url = 'http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Passport&d=getUserInfo&callback=checkcallback&code='+data.code+'&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*1048576);
                jQuery.getScript(url);
                //userinfo();
             }

        });
    }

    function initUserInfo(data){
        if(data['uid']){
            session_userid = data['uid'];
            $('#special_user_info').show();
            $('#special_Login').hide();

            $('.j-username').text(data['username']);
            $('#messag').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/messagelist/'); //信息
            $('#notice').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/notice/'); //提醒
            $('#messagelist').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/messagelist/'); //消息
            $('#setting_u').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //设置
            $('#profile').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/'); //修改资料
            $('#u_profile').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/'); //个人资料
            $('#u_brand').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/brand/');
            $('#u_tlq').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/age-topic/');
            $('#u_ask').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/question/');
            $('#u_dianping').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/dianping/index/');
            $('#center').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //个人中心
            $('.j-username').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //个人中心
            $('.j-head-a').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //头像链接
            $('#profile_pw').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/password/'); //修改密码
            $('#fav').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/fav/'); //我的收藏
            $('#quan').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/quan/'); //我的话题
            $('#quan_group').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/quan/');
            $('#mamaLogout').attr('href', data['logoutUrl']);
            $('.j-head_image').attr('src', data['avatar']);
            $('.j-pms').text(data['newpm']);
            if (data['newpm'] != "" && data['newpm'] != undefined) {
                $('.j-pms').show();
            }



            if(typeof(cms_page_type) != 'undefined'  &&   cms_page_type == 'mamacn_index' ){
                data['ifset'] =1;
            }
            activityCity(data);
        }

        if(typeof(cms_page_type) != 'undefined'){
            if(cms_page_type == 'art' || cms_page_type == 'list' ){
                right_qrqm_block(data,now_date);
                right_qrqm_ajax(qrqm_date);
            }else if(cms_page_type == 'mamacn_index'){
                mamacn_index(data,now_date);
            }
        }
    }
    function activityCity(data){
        var ret= 'http://www.mama.cn/cms_shtml/php/userhead.php';
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: ret,
            data: data,
            dataType: "json",
            success: function(dataa){
                $('#city').attr('href',dataa.url);
                //alert(dataa.url);
            }
          });
    }
    function cklogin(){
        if(typeof(cms_page_type) == 'undefined'){
            var orderdate = myGetCookie('orderdate');
            if(session_userid<1 && orderdate ==''){
                var login_url= 'http://www.mama.cn/jump.html';
                $('#qrqm_order').attr('href',login_url);
            }
            if(orderdate !=''){
                var in_order_url= 'http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Qrqm&d=skip';
                $('#qrqm_order').attr('href',in_order_url);
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    function myGetCookie(a) {
        if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
            c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(a + "=");
            if (c_start != -1) {
                c_start = c_start + a.length + 1;
                c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
                if (c_end == -1) {
                    c_end = document.cookie.length
                }
                return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end))
            }
        }
        return "";
    }
</script>
<!--mama adv-->

 $.getScript(myurl);
});
function initUserInfo2(data){
	var uid = 0;
	if(data['uid']){
		uid = data['uid'];
	}
	$.getJSON("/cms_shtml/php/ajax.php?type=tips&uid="+uid,function(data){
		tips_url = data['js_url'];
		$.ajax({
			type: 'GET',
			dataType: 'script',
			url: tips_url,
			cache: true
		});
	});
}
</script>

$(function(){

function initUserInfo(data){

  var rsurl = location.href;

  if(data['uid']){
    //写cookie
    $.cookie('__xhash__mama_', data['hash']); 

    $.getJSON('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=xlogin&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024), function(result){
  if(result['data'] && result['data']['loginstatus']  == 1){
rsurl = rsurl+'?i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
window.location.href=rsurl;
  }
      }); 

  }else{
  $.getJSON('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=xlogin&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024), function(result){
$.cookie('__xhash__mama_', '');
      }); 
  }
}
</script>
