<script type="text/javascript">

function addemail(fm){

if(fm == 'emailform'){
var statu = $('#estatu').val();
var birthyear = $('#ebirthyear').val();
var birthmonth = $('#ebirthmonth').val();
var birthday = $('#ebirthday').val();
var email = $('#email').val();
}else if(fm == 'emailform2'){
var statu = $('#estatu2').val();
var birthyear = $('#ebirthyear2').val();
var birthmonth = $('#ebirthmonth2').val();
var birthday = $('#ebirthday2').val();
var email = $('#email2').val();
}

if(!birthyear || !birthmonth || !birthday){
alert('请输入完整的日期');
return ;
}

if(!email){
alert('请输入订阅邮箱地址');
return ;
}else{
//var pattern=/^\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]w+)*$/;
//if(!pattern.test(email)){
//	alert("邮箱填写不正确");
//	return false;
//}
}

var url = "http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&amp;op=addemail";

var newurl = url.replace('amp;','');
$.post(newurl, $("#"+fm).serialize(), function(data1){

var dataObj=eval("("+data1+")");//转换为json对象 
if(dataObj['result'] == 1){

var msg = dataObj['msg']+' 现在将跳转去注册!';
alert(msg);
if(fm == 'emailform'){
$.fancybox.close();
}
var rsurl = encodeURIComponent(location.href);
window.location.href="http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=view&amp;callback="+rsurl; 

}else{
alert(dataObj['msg']);
}

 });

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function getCityData(ty){
if(ty == 'yspcity'){
var pp = 'yprovince';
var cc = 'ycity'
}else if(ty == 'spcity'){
var pp = 'province';
var cc = 'city'
}else if(ty == 'aspcity'){
var pp = 'aprovince';
var cc = 'acity'
}
var p = $("#"+pp).val();
var pid = $("#"+pp).get(0).selectedIndex;  //获取Select选择的索引值 

$.get('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&op=getcity&pid='+pid, function(data) {
var citydata = '<select id="'+cc+'" name="'+cc+'" >'+data+'</select>';

$('#'+ty).html(citydata);
});
}

function updateMembers(){
$.get('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&op=updatemebers', function(data){	
});
}
</script>

$(document).ready(function() {
$("#toaddemail").fancybox({
'titlePosition'		: 'inside',
'transitionIn'		: 'none',
'transitionOut'		: 'none'
});
$("#toshowask").fancybox({
'titlePosition'		: 'inside',
'transitionIn'		: 'none',
'transitionOut'		: 'none'
});
});

$(function(){
var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
$.getScript(myurl);
});

function initUserInfo(data){

  var rsurl = location.href;

  if(data['uid']){
    //写cookie
    $.cookie('__xhash__mama_', data['hash']); 

    $.getJSON('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=xlogin&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024), function(result){
  if(result['data'] && result['data']['loginstatus']  == 1){
rsurl = rsurl+'?i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
window.location.href=rsurl;
  }
      }); 

  }else{
  $.getJSON('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=xlogin&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024), function(result){
$.cookie('__xhash__mama_', '');
      }); 
  }
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function addemail(fm){

if(fm == 'emailform'){
var statu = $('#estatu').val();
var birthyear = $('#ebirthyear').val();
var birthmonth = $('#ebirthmonth').val();
var birthday = $('#ebirthday').val();
var email = $('#email').val();
}else if(fm == 'emailform2'){
var statu = $('#estatu2').val();
var birthyear = $('#ebirthyear2').val();
var birthmonth = $('#ebirthmonth2').val();
var birthday = $('#ebirthday2').val();
var email = $('#email2').val();
}

if(!birthyear || !birthmonth || !birthday){
alert('请输入完整的日期');
return ;
}

if(!email){
alert('请输入订阅邮箱地址');
return ;
}else{
//var pattern=/^\w+([-+.]\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]w+)*$/;
//if(!pattern.test(email)){
//	alert("邮箱填写不正确");
//	return false;
//}
}

var url = "http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&amp;op=addemail";

var newurl = url.replace('amp;','');
$.post(newurl, $("#"+fm).serialize(), function(data1){

var dataObj=eval("("+data1+")");//转换为json对象 
if(dataObj['result'] == 1){

var msg = dataObj['msg']+' 现在将跳转去注册!';
alert(msg);
if(fm == 'emailform'){
$.fancybox.close();
}
var rsurl = encodeURIComponent(location.href);
window.location.href="http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=view&amp;callback="+rsurl; 

}else{
alert(dataObj['msg']);
}

 });

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">

function getCityData(ty){
if(ty == 'yspcity'){
var pp = 'yprovince';
var cc = 'ycity'
}else if(ty == 'spcity'){
var pp = 'province';
var cc = 'city'
}else if(ty == 'aspcity'){
var pp = 'aprovince';
var cc = 'acity'
}
var p = $("#"+pp).val();
var pid = $("#"+pp).get(0).selectedIndex;  //获取Select选择的索引值 

$.get('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&op=getcity&pid='+pid, function(data) {
var citydata = '<select id="'+cc+'" name="'+cc+'" >'+data+'</select>';

$('#'+ty).html(citydata);
});
}

function updateMembers(){
$.get('http://www.mama.cn/baby/zhoukan/index.php?mod=ajax&op=updatemebers', function(data){	
});
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
window.dateFilter = function() {
	UI.DatePicker.show(event,{
		lang:'zh_CN',
		format:'yyyy年MM月dd日',
		startDay:'2010年09月29日',
		endDay:'2016年06月02日',
		markDays:{'':{title:'您的微薄',className:'datebg'}},
		call:function(date){
			document.location.href='?'+'filter='+0+'&date='+UI.formatDate(date,'yyyyMMdd')
		}
	});
};
</script>

var openQuickLogin = 0;
function mb_quick_reg(el,from){
	if(!MI.user.account && !openQuickLogin){	
		var frame = $('QuickLoginFrame');
		var D = frame ? UI.closest(frame,'.D') : null;
		if(D && D.style.display != 'none'){
				return;
		}
		else{
			if(frame){
				UI.remove(frame);
				if(D){
					UI.remove(D);
				}
				frame = D = null;
			}
			openQuickLogin = 1;
			setTimeout(function(){
				MI.dialog.show({
					title:'<h3 class="DmainTit">微博登录</h3>',

<script type="text/javascript">
function changeLang(event){
	var e = window.event || event || {};
	var dom = e.target || e.srcElement,
		href = document.location.href,
		lang = dom.getAttribute('href'),
		index = href.indexOf('?'),
		newHref = href;
	if(lang!=null){
		var indexL = lang.indexOf('lang='),
			langTxt = lang.substring(indexL);
		if(index == -1){
			newHref = newHref + '?' + langTxt; 
		}
		else{
			var hasLang = href.indexOf('lang');
			if(hasLang == -1)
				newHref += '&' + langTxt;
			else{
				newHref = newHref.substring(0,hasLang) + langTxt;
			}
		}
		document.location.href = newHref;
	}
}
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">  
    var system ={  
        win : false,  
        mac : false,  
        xll : false  
    };  
    
    var mobileScan = parseInt(myGetCookie('mobile_scan'),10);
	if( !(mobileScan > 0)  ){
		//检测平台  
	    var p = navigator.platform;  
	    system.win = p.indexOf("Win") == 0;  
	    system.mac = p.indexOf("Mac") == 0;  
	    //system.x11 = (p == "X11") || (p.indexOf("Linux") == 0);  
	    
	    var isPad = isPad();
	    //跳转语句  
	    //if( isPad ||  !(system.win||system.mac||system.x11)){
	    if( isPad ||  !(system.win||system.mac) ){
	        window.location.href="http://m.mama.cn/3014/";  
	    }
	}
    
    function isPad(){
    	equipmentInfo = navigator.userAgent;
		equipmentInfo = equipmentInfo.substring(0,40);
		equipmentInfo = equipmentInfo.toLowerCase();
		
		if(equipmentInfo.indexOf("pad") > 0){
			return true;
		}else{
			return false;
		}
    }
    function myGetCookie(a) {
		if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
			c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(a + "=");
			if (c_start != -1) {
				c_start = c_start + a.length + 1;
				c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
				if (c_end == -1) {
					c_end = document.cookie.length
				}
				return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end))
			}
		}
		return ""
	}
   
</script>

<script>
    $(function () {
        var _nav = $("#allNav");
        var _box = $(".ny-fixl");
        var _footer = $(".footerWrap");
        var h = _box.height();
        var ft = _footer.offset().top;
        var end = $(document).height() - _footer.height() - _box.height()-50;
        $(window).scroll(function () {
            var t = _nav.offset().top + _nav.height() - 6;
            if(t+h>ft){
                t = end;
            }
            _box.css("top",t);
        }).trigger("scroll");
    });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    $("#special_Login .sLog").hover(
        function(){
            $(this).find("dl").show();
        },
        function(){
            $(this).find("dl").hide();
        }
    );

    $("#special_user_info").hover(
        function(){
            $("#sui_drop").show();
        },
        function(){
            $("#sui_drop").hide();
        }
    );
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    session_userid = 0;
    var qrqm_date = '';

    var myDate = new Date();
    var Year = myDate.getFullYear();    //获取完整的年份(4位,1970-????)
    var Month1 = myDate.getMonth()+1;       //获取当前月份(0-11,0代表1月)
    var Month = Month1;
    if(Month1<10) var Month ='0'+Month1;
    var day = myDate.getDate();        //获取当前日(1-31)
    var now_date = Year+'-'+Month+'-'+day;

    $(document).ready(function () {
        //获取passport 登录和注册
        var myurl='http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Passport&d=getUrl&callback=initUrl&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
        $.getScript(myurl);
        //获取登录状态
        //var myurl='http://um.mama.cn/connect.php?action=info&callback=initUserInfo&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*100024);
        //$.getScript(myurl);
    });

    function initUrl(result) {
        $('#passport-login').attr('href',result['loginUrl']);
        $('#passport-register').attr('href',result['registerUrl']);
        jQuery.ajax({
             url:result['getCodeUrl'],
             dataType:"jsonp",
             jsonp:"callback",
             cache:false, /*避免jquery缓存*/
             success:function(data){

                /*这里自己编写代码，把接口获取的code值发给passport，以便交换得到一个ticket,然后将ticekt缓存在本地的session中*/
                var url = 'http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Passport&d=getUserInfo&callback=checkcallback&code='+data.code+'&i='+Math.floor(Math.random()*1048576);
                jQuery.getScript(url);
                //userinfo();
             }

        });
    }

    function initUserInfo(data){
        if(data['uid']){
            session_userid = data['uid'];
            $('#special_user_info').show();
            $('#special_Login').hide();

            $('.j-username').text(data['username']);
            $('#messag').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/messagelist/'); //信息
            $('#notice').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/notice/'); //提醒
            $('#messagelist').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/messagelist/'); //消息
            $('#setting_u').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //设置
            $('#profile').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/'); //修改资料
            $('#u_profile').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/'); //个人资料
            $('#u_brand').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/brand/');
            $('#u_tlq').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/age-topic/');
            $('#u_ask').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/question/');
            $('#u_dianping').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/dianping/index/');
            $('#center').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //个人中心
            $('.j-username').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //个人中心
            $('.j-head-a').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/'); //头像链接
            $('#profile_pw').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/profile/password/'); //修改密码
            $('#fav').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/fav/'); //我的收藏
            $('#quan').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/quan/'); //我的话题
            $('#quan_group').attr('href','http://www.mama.cn/u/'+data['uid']+'/quan/');
            $('#mamaLogout').attr('href', data['logoutUrl']);
            $('.j-head_image').attr('src', data['avatar']);
            $('.j-pms').text(data['newpm']);
            if (data['newpm'] != "" && data['newpm'] != undefined) {
                $('.j-pms').show();
            }



            if(typeof(cms_page_type) != 'undefined'  &&   cms_page_type == 'mamacn_index' ){
                data['ifset'] =1;
            }
            activityCity(data);
        }

        if(typeof(cms_page_type) != 'undefined'){
            if(cms_page_type == 'art' || cms_page_type == 'list' ){
                right_qrqm_block(data,now_date);
                right_qrqm_ajax(qrqm_date);
            }else if(cms_page_type == 'mamacn_index'){
                mamacn_index(data,now_date);
            }
        }
    }
    function activityCity(data){
        var ret= 'http://www.mama.cn/cms_shtml/php/userhead.php';
        $.ajax({
            type: "POST",
            url: ret,
            data: data,
            dataType: "json",
            success: function(dataa){
                $('#city').attr('href',dataa.url);
                //alert(dataa.url);
            }
          });
    }
    function cklogin(){
        if(typeof(cms_page_type) == 'undefined'){
            var orderdate = myGetCookie('orderdate');
            if(session_userid<1 && orderdate ==''){
                var login_url= 'http://www.mama.cn/jump.html';
                $('#qrqm_order').attr('href',login_url);
            }
            if(orderdate !=''){
                var in_order_url= 'http://www.mama.cn/index.php?g=Home&a=Qrqm&d=skip';
                $('#qrqm_order').attr('href',in_order_url);
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    function myGetCookie(a) {
        if (document.cookie.length > 0) {
            c_start = document.cookie.indexOf(a + "=");
            if (c_start != -1) {
                c_start = c_start + a.length + 1;
                c_end = document.cookie.indexOf(";", c_start);
                if (c_end == -1) {
                    c_end = document.cookie.length
                }
                return unescape(document.cookie.substring(c_start, c_end))
            }
        }
        return "";
    }
</script>

function mama_adv_run() {
	if( typeof OA_zones !='undefined' ) {
		var zonenames = '';  
		for (var zonename in OA_zones){ 
			var result = OA_show(zonename,true);
			if( !result ) {
				if( jQuery('#hidden_'+zonename).html() !=''){
                    jQuery('#hidden_'+zonename).show();
                }
                if(jQuery('#'+zonename).html()=='' ){
                    jQuery('#'+zonename).hide();
                }  
            }else{
                zonenames +=zonename+'|';
            }
		}
	}
	oa_load_count_adv_impr(zonenames);
}
setTimeout("mama_adv_run()",3000);

function initUserInfo2(data){
	var uid = 0;
	if(data['uid']){
		uid = data['uid'];
	}
	$.getJSON("/cms_shtml/php/ajax.php?type=tips&uid="+uid,function(data){
		tips_url = data['js_url'];
		$.ajax({
			type: 'GET',
			dataType: 'script',
			url: tips_url,
			cache: true
		});
	});
}

    var url=window.location.href;
    var reCookie = function(strCookie,key){
        var start = strCookie.indexOf(key + '=');
        if(-1 == start)
            return null;
        start += key.length + 1;
        var end = strCookie.indexOf(';', start);
        if (end == -1) return unescape(strCookie.substring(start));
        return unescape(strCookie.substring(start, end));

<script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
var extras = (GetCookie(g_brdCkiPrfx+'extras')||'').split('|');
var getMmbExtra = function(pos,bdecode,beval){
    if(pos >= extras.length) return '';
    bdecode = bdecode || false;
    beval = beval || false;
    var ret = extras[pos];
    if(bdecode) ret = decodeURIComponent(ret);
    if(beval) ret = eval(ret);
    return ret;
};

var nick = eval(GetCookie(g_brdCkiPrfx+'nick'));
var hash = GetCookie(g_brdCkiPrfx+'hash');
var uid = "";
var userlevel = "";
if(!nick || !hash){
    nick = "";
}else{
    uid = GetCookie(g_brdCkiPrfx+'uid');
    userlevel = getMmbExtra(1,true,true);
}

NTKF_PARAM = {
    siteid:"kf_9910",
    settingid: "kf_9910_1353159430540",
    uid:uid ? uid : "",
    uname:nick ? nick : "",
    isvip:uid ? "1" : "0",
    userlevel:userlevel ? userlevel : ""
};

(function() {
    var ntnode = document.createElement('script'); 
    ntnode.type = 'text/javascript'; 
    ntnode.async = true;
    ntnode.src = document.location.protocol + '//dl.ntalker.com/js/xn6/ntkfstat.js?siteid=kf_9910';
    var snode = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    snode.parentNode.insertBefore(ntnode, snode);
})();
</script><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://res.zbird.cn/css/wwwcache/1180.css?r212715">
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://res.zbird.cn/css/rp/wwwcache~new_publicstyle.css?r212715">

      <div class="yh35000 b3txt1">北极光的神秘传说</div>
      <div class="s123e3 b3txt2">你知道吗？在夜空中散发着绚丽光芒的北极光(Aurora)<br>
拥有一个美丽的传说：黎明女神欧若拉(Aurora)爱上了美少年提托诺斯。<br>
此后每个黎明之际，每当她驾着天马金车飞向恋人时，<br>
她心中暗藏的思念之情便化为了空中的璀璨光芒，闪耀动人。<br>
每一对目睹过北极光的恋人都会受到欧若拉的祝福，<br>
他们携手而至，让这稀有闪耀的“北极光”，见证彼此的幸福约定。</div>

听了北极光的故事，<br>
他们决心为钻石小鸟特别研制出璀璨切割的 “北极光”，<br>

他们是我们心中唯一能够切割北极光钻石的匠人。

        var bg5 = $("#bg_05").offset().top;
        var bg8 = $("#bg_08").offset().top;
        var bg9 = $("#bg_09").offset().top;
        var bg11 = $("#bg_11").offset().top;
        var bg16 = $("#bg_16").offset().top;

        var t = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
        if(t >= bg1 && t <= bg3) {
              $(".a2_fubor1").addClass('a2_fubor1_hover');
            }
        window.onscroll = function(){
            var t = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
            if(t >= bg1 && t <= bg3) {
              $(".a2_fubor1").addClass('a2_fubor1_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor2").removeClass('a2_fubor2_hover');
            }
            if(t >= bg3 && t <= bg4){
              $(".a2_fubor1").removeClass('a2_fubor1_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor2").addClass('a2_fubor2_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor3").removeClass('a2_fubor3_hover');
            }
            if(t >= bg4 && t <= bg9){
              $(".a2_fubor2").removeClass('a2_fubor2_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor3").addClass('a2_fubor3_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor4").removeClass('a2_fubor4_hover');
            }

              $(".a2_fubor4").addClass('a2_fubor4_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor5").removeClass('a2_fubor5_hover');

            if(t >= bg16 && t <= bg19){
              $(".a2_fubor4").removeClass('a2_fubor4_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor5").addClass('a2_fubor5_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor6").removeClass('a2_fubor6_hover');
            }
            if(t >= bg19){
              $(".a2_fubor5").removeClass('a2_fubor5_hover');
              $(".a2_fubor6").addClass('a2_fubor6_hover');
            }
            if(t >= bg1 +200){
              if(!$(".bg3borer").hasClass('animateb')){
                $(".bg3borer").addClass('animateb');
              }

  /*表格高亮事件*/
  _$('.a2_table_layout_tr').live('mouseover', function(){
    $(this).children("td").removeClass("a2_table_layout_td_gray").addClass("a2_table_layout_td_blue");
    $(this).children("td:last-child").removeClass("a2_table_layout_td_gray_2").addClass("a2_table_layout_td_blue_2");
    $(".a2_table_price").hide();
    // $(this).children("td").children(".a2_table_layout_td_line").children(".a2_table_price").show();
  }).live('mouseleave', function(){
    $(this).children("td").removeClass("a2_table_layout_td_blue").addClass("a2_table_layout_td_gray");
    $(this).children("td:last-child").removeClass("a2_table_layout_td_blue_2").addClass("a2_table_layout_td_gray_2");
    // $(this).children("td").children(".a2_table_layout_td_line").children(".a2_table_price").hide();
    $(".a2_table_price").hide();
  });

  
  /*表格排序效果*/
  _$(".con_4_table_a").live('click',function(){

    if( $(this).attr('data') != $('#type').val() ){
      $('#ord').val(0);
    }

    $('#type').val($(this).attr('data'));
    if($(this).attr('data') == '')
    {
      $('#ord').val(0);
      ajax_page();
      return ;
    }

    var sum = parseInt($('#ord').val());
    if(sum == 0){               //点击后从高到低排序
      $(this).addClass("arrow_highToLow");
      $(this).attr("title","点击后从高到低排序");
      $('#ord').val(1);
      
    }else if(sum == 1){             //点击后从低到高排序
      $(this).addClass("arrow_lowToHigh");
      $(this).removeClass("arrow_highToLow");
      $(this).attr("title","点击后从低到高排序");
      $('#ord').val(2);
      
    }else if(sum == 2){             //点击后恢复默认排序
      $(this).addClass("arrow_highToLow");
      $(this).removeClass("arrow_lowToHigh");
      $(this).attr("title","点击后从高到低排序");
      $('#ord').val(1);
    }
    ajax_page();
  });
  
  /***表格切换***/
  _$(".a2_biaoqian").live('click', function(){
    var num = parseInt($(this).attr("number"));
    $(".a2_table").hide();
    $(".a2_biaoqian").removeClass("a2_biaoqian_1_click").removeClass("a2_biaoqian_2_click").removeClass("a2_biaoqian_3_click");
    $(this).addClass("a2_biaoqian_" + num +"_click");
    $('#feny').val(num);
    ajax_page(1, 1);
    //$("#a2_table_" +num).show()
  });

     var select_sum = true;
   _$(".a2_footer_box_select").click(function(){
     if(select_sum == true){
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").show();
       select_sum = false;
     }else{
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").hide();
       select_sum = true;
     }
   });
   _$(".a2_footer_box_select_a").click(function(){
     if(select_sum == false){
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").hide();
   /*_$(".a2_footer_box_select_text").attr('data',  _$(this).attr('name'));*/
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_text").html( _$(this).html());
      select_sum = true;
     }
   });
   _$(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").mouseleave(function(){
     $(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").hide();
      select_sum = true;
   });
   _$(".a2_footer_box_select_a").click(function(){
     if(select_sum == 1){
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_ul").hide();
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_text").attr('data',  _$(this).attr('name'));
       _$(".a2_footer_box_select_text").html( _$(this).html());
       select_sum--;
       var city =  _$(this).attr('name');
       if(city == 'shanghai'){
          html = '黄浦区南京东路299号宏伊广场写字楼8楼';
        }else if(city == 'beijingxda'){
         html = '北京市王府井大街138号新东安T2办公楼7层';
       }else if(city == 'hangzhou'){
          html = '杭州市下城区环城北路208号坤和中心18层1802室';
        }else if(city == 'guangzhou'){
          html = '广州市天河区天河路230号万菱汇国际中心35层3505室';
        }else if(city == 'ningbo'){
          html = '宁波市海曙区车轿街69号恒泰大厦7层';
        }else if(city == 'nanjing'){
          html = '南京市秦淮区汉中路89号金鹰写字楼A座12层';
        }else if(city == 'chengdu'){
          html = '成都市总府路2号时代广场A座22层';
        }else if(city == 'wuhan'){
          html = '武汉市江汉区万松园路100号西园商业步行街1-A-06';
        }else if(city == 'xian'){
          html = '西安市南关正街88号长安国际A座5层503室';
        }else if(city == 'qingdao'){
          html = '香港中路40号数码港旗舰大厦37层钻石小鸟';
        }else if(city == 'chongqing'){
          html = '重庆渝中区邹容路68号大都会商厦15层';
        }else if(city == 'tianjin'){
          html = '天津市和平区南京路219号天津中心1801室';

   var input_text_2="手机号码";

   $(".a2_footer_input_2").blur(function(){

<script type="text/javascript">
  $('.a2_footer_btn').click(function(){
    var p = $.trim($('#vphone').val());
    var act = $(".a2_footer_box_select_text").attr('data');
    var vname = $.trim($('#vname').val());
    if(act == ''){
      commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'请选择体验中心'});
        return false;
    }
    if(vname == '' || vname == 'X先生/女士'){
        commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'请输入您的姓名'});
        return false;
    }
    if(p == '' || p == '手机号码'){
        commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'请输入您的手机号码'});
        return false;
    }
    var mobile = p.replace(/\s+[_]/g, "");
    if(!(/^1[3458][0-9]{9}$/.test(mobile))){
        commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'您输入的手机格式错误'});
        return false;
    }

    $.ajax({
        url : '/subscribe/easyappointment',
        type : 'POST',
        cache : false,
        data :  {'to' : act, 'tel' : p, 'name':vname, 'code':1078},
        success : function(data)
        {
            if(1 == data)
            {
                $('#vname').val('X先生/女士');
                $('#vphone').val('手机号码');
                $('.yuyue').hide();
                commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'您的预约已成功，详情请拨打400-880-0051'});
                _hmt.push(['_trackPageview','/virtual/aurora']);
                return false;
            }else{
                $('#vname').val('X先生/女士');
                $('#vphone').val('手机号码');
                $('.yuyue').hide();
                commonPromptPop({'title':'提示信息','promptMsg':'预约失败，详情请拨打400-880-0051'});
                return false;
            }
        }
      });
  })

  function ajax_page(page, m){
  var ty = $('#feny').val();
  if(ty == 2){
    $.ajax({
          'url' : '/ajaxrequest/auroracomments/',
          'type' : 'GET',
          'data' :  {type : 'diamond', diamond : 'all', pn : page},
          'success' : function(data){
            $('#lists').html(data);
          }
    })
  }
  else if (ty == 3){
    $.ajax({
          'url' : '/ajaxrequest/aurorasales/',
          'type' : 'GET',
          'data' :  {pn : page},
          'success' : function(data){
            $('#lists').html(data);
          }
      })
  }else{
    if(m == 1){
      var ofield = '';
      var omode = 0;
    }else{
      var ofield = $('#type').val();
      var omode = $('#ord').val();
    }
    
    if(typeof(page) == 'undefined'){
      page = $('#pnum').val();
    }

    $.ajax({
          'url' : '/apidiamond/bjgbf/',
          'type' : 'GET',
